metadata.title: CVE-2017-15288 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The compilation daemon in Scala before 2.10.7, 2.11.x before 2.11.12, and2.12.x before 2.12.4 uses weak permissions for private files in/tmp/scala-devel/${USER:shared}/scalac-compile-server-port, which allowslocal users to write to arbitrary class files and consequently gainprivileges.

criterions.comment: scala: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
